Perplex walks away from Papertron to get away from him...

  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wed=
nesday, July 04, 2001 8:19 PM
  Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


  =
PAPERTRON




  (Papertron smooshes up again. He looks around the room frow=
ning. He converts to robot mode and removes a mirror from his wrist compart=
ment. He sits it on the floor and converts to beast mode. He picks the mirr=
or up in his tail and looks at it.)



  Papertron: Eeeeeerrrrrrrrrffffffff=
!!!!....


   
  (He flattens out to paper and walks towards Perplex...)

 =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 2:57 AM
    Subject: Re=
: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


    Zeni ran as fast as he could from the roo=
m.

    Arrow: Papertron, is that all you're good for? Wait, let me answer =
that. Yes! Stupid chameleon.

    Arrow left the room...

      ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
      From: *Orchid* 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
=
      Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 2:54 AM
      Subject: Re: Windlord/Tr=
inity/TO Zero.


      PAPERTRON




      Papertron: Wha?...Hmm!...YUMMY! =
YUMMY!...Romaine lettuce is a green leafy thing that is edible but I don't =
want to eat it, I just want some so I can run through it and get it stuck t=
o my feet! HEH!....HEH!.....Know who I am? I'm Papertron!!! Holder of 4 ide=
ntities!!...Including this one! I am Papertron! I am Apple Furry Murry! I a=
m The Smelly Guy! I am The Silly Goon! HEAR ME ROAR!!!! Isabooboo!!!!...Wha=
t's your name?



      (Papertron awaits a response from Zeni while lickin=
g his lips...)

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulsti=
ce Omega 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, July=
 04, 2001 1:25 AM
        Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


        =
Zeni: What's romaine lettuce?...

          ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
         From: *Orchid* 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Se=
nt: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 1:21 AM
          Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinit=
y/TO Zero.


          PAPERTRON




          Papertron: HEH!...HEH!....Ro=
maine lettuce. I want some but NOT to eat! ERF FER FER FER!....

          =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: Soulstice Omega 
        =
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, July 04, 2001 =
1:14 AM
            Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


            Ze=
ni: What are greens?...

              ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
        From: *Orchid* 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
         =
     Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 2001 8:23 PM
              Subject: Re: Windlo=
rd/Trinity/TO Zero.


              PAPERTRON




              (Papertron =
smooshes up when Arrow yells. He returns to his normal shape.)



         =
     Papertron: YUMMY YUMMY!!!...



              (Papertron licks his lip=
s.)



              Papertron: Hmm! Okay.



              (Papertron walk=
s up to Zeni.)



              Papertron: HEH!...HEH!...Do you have any gr=
eens? I want some greens but I do NOT want to eat them! HEH!...HEH!...

   =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: Soulstice =
Omega 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Tu=
esday, July 03, 2001 7:37 PM
                Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/=
TO Zero.


                Arrow replies to Papertron.

                Arr=
ow: None of your business, so SHUT UP CHAMELEON!...

                  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                  From: *Orchid* 
               =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesday, July 03, 20=
01 5:28 PM
                  Subject: Re: Windlord/Trinity/TO Zero.


     =
             BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON




                  (Birdbot ducked down=
 and was about to jump at Trinity but went back to his normal position afte=
r she left and looks at Aerotaur.)



                  Birdbot: Can I have=
 a dorito? Give me a dorito...



                  (Papertron looks at Arr=
ow.)



                  Papertron: You from around here? ERF FER FER FER!=
!!...



                  (Papertron licks his lips....)

                =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: airly2000@yahoo=
.com 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    S=
ent: Monday, July 02, 2001 3:20 PM
                    Subject: Windlord/Tr=
inity/TO Zero.


                    Trinity::

                    "Uncle =
Aerotaur, I'll go to play outside base" said Trinity.

                    =
"Wait Trinity it's not good idea the you go out alone!!!" said 
           =
         Windlord, but it was late she had run where Zero and Zeni were   a=
nd 
                    the child said "Hello, still do you like play "seek=
 and found" 
                    outside base ?"

                    OOC: =
I guess that Zeni is with Zero, if he don't, sorry.
